info.name: ERP
info.description:
# Introduction
What does your API do?

# Overview
Things that the developers should know about

# Authentication
What is the preferred way of using the API?

# Error Codes
What errors and status codes can a user expect?

# Rate limit
Is there a limit to the number of requests an user can send?

graphql.query:
{
  users{
    _id,
    userName,
    password,
    firstName,
    lastName,

    address1,
    address2,
    city,

    country,

    salary,

    salaryOld,

    lastLogin,

    refPerson,
    refPersonPhone,
    refPersonAddress,
    IMEIAllowed,
    bankAccountNumber,
    bankName,
    bankBranchCity,
    bankIIFSCCode,
    bankAccountHolderName,
    designation{
      _id,
      name
    },

      _id,
      name
    },
    modulesAllowed{
      _id,
      name,
    },
    campsAllowed{
      _id,
      name
    },
    createdAt,
    updatedAt
  }
}

query getUserById($userId: ID!){
  user(_id:$userId){
    _id,
    userName,
    password,
    firstName,
    lastName,
    email,
    phone1,
    phone2,
    phoneIMEI,
    address1,
    address2,
    city,
    state,
    country,
    zipcode,
    joiningPlace,
    joiningDate,
    dateOfBirth,
    qualification,
    salary,
    batta,
    salaryEffectiveDate,
    salaryOld,
    battaOld,
    loginAllowed,
    lastLogin,
    lastLoginDevice,
    refPerson,
    refPersonPhone,
    refPersonAddress,
    IMEIAllowed,
    bankAccountNumber,
    bankName,
    bankBranchCity,
    bankIIFSCCode,
    bankAccountHolderName,
    designation{
      _id,
      name
    },
    rolesAllowed{
      _id,
      name
    },
    modulesAllowed{
      _id,
      name,
    },
    campAllowed{
      _id,
      name
    },
    createdAt,
    updatedAt
  }
}

query{
  devices{_id,
  OS,
  upTime,
    cellNumber,
    IMEI,
    userAssigned{firstName},
    lastUsedUser{firstName},
    createdAt,
    updatedAt,
    batteryPercentage,
    networkStrength,
    networkName,
    lastKnownLatitude,
    lastKnownLongitude
  }
}

mutation createNMRWork($nmrWorkInput:NMRWorkInput){
  createNMRWork(nmrWorkInput:$nmrWorkInput){
    _id,
    supplier{_id,name},
    workType{_id,name},
    remark,
    remark,
    camp{_id,name},
    labourInvolved{_id,name},
    indentNumber,
    status,
    shift,
    finalCost,
    approvalsNeeded{_id,role{_id,name}},
    createdAt,
    updatedAt
  }
}

{
  suppliers {
    _id
    name
    contactname
    email
    phone1
    address1
    address2
    city
    state
    country
    zipcode
    panNumber
    gstNumber
    cstNumber
    accountBankName
    accountBranchName
    accountBranchCity
    accountNumber
    accountIIFSCCode
    accountHolderName
    accountPaymentFavour
    supplierTypes {
        _id,
      name
    }
    updatedAt
    createdAt
  }
}

mutation createSupplier($supplierInput:SupplierInput){
  createSupplier(supplierInput:$supplierInput){
    _id,
    name,
    contactname,
      _id
    name
    contactname
    email
    phone1
    address1
    address2
    city
    state
    country
    zipcode
    panNumber
    gstNumber
    cstNumber
    accountBankName
    accountBranchName
    accountBranchCity
    accountNumber
    accountIIFSCCode
    accountHolderName
    accountPaymentFavour
    supplierTypes {
        _id,
      name
    }
    updatedAt
    createdAt
  
  }
}

query{
  supplier(_id:"5f2b69ccdc2c71141c702d16"){
_id
    name
    contactname
    email
    phone1
    address1
    address2
    city
    state
    country
    zipcode
    panNumber
    gstNumber
    cstNumber
    accountBankName
    accountBranchName
    accountBranchCity
    accountNumber
    accountIIFSCCode
    accountHolderName
    accountPaymentFavour
    supplierTypes {
      name
    }
    updatedAt
    createdAt
  }
}

mutation updateSupplier($supID:ID!,$supplierInput:SupplierEditInput!){
  updateSupplier(_id:$supID,supplierEditInput:$supplierInput){
    _id,
    name,
    contactname,
      _id
    name
    contactname
    email
    phone1
    address1
    address2
    city
    state
    country
    zipcode
    panNumber
    gstNumber
    cstNumber
    accountBankName
    accountBranchName
    accountBranchCity
    accountNumber
    accountIIFSCCode
    accountHolderName
    accountPaymentFavour
    supplierTypes {
      name
    }
    updatedAt
    createdAt
  
  }
}
